The shopkeeper nods and takes the cards eagerly, reaching down under the 
table he was at, pressing a few buttons, the doors shutting and locking, 
windows being blocked by sliding steel panels, a "Closed" sign reading on the 
front of the "Cookie Store".  The walls swivelled and revealed new walls 
lined with just about every weapon ever.

"Pick your choice."

(Remember you can't have more than seven weapons)
